name: ScanDroitin™ Chondroitin Sulfate, USP
description: ScanDroitin™ Chondroitin Sulfate, USP is a natural and pure choice for the sourcing of top-quality ingredients in your finished formulations. Chondroitin sulfate by ZPD is strictly manufactured under Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP) and in accordance with European food legislation for dietary supplements. ZPD will support you with technical expertise and competences until your final product is ready to market.
